package.name: instantbird
package.unpack: rm -rf comm-esr l10n tar xf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.tar.xz mv thunderbird-${PKGVERSION} comm-esr cp ${SRCDIR}/mozconfig-thunderbird-31.0-20141118 comm-esr/.mozconfig mkdir l10n tar -C l10n -xf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.de-es-pl-ru.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/dotcargo-i686-20170622.tar.gz
package.build:
export PATH=` pwd `/cargo/bin:$PATH export CARGO_HOME=` pwd `/cargo export RUSTUP_HOME=` pwd `/rustup echo $SHELL export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL # export CFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2" && # export CXXFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2"
workdir=` pwd ` cd comm-esr echo $SHELL export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL export CFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2" && export CXXFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2" ## mkdir tb-build mkdir -p mozilla/tb-build sed -i 's%PWD%'${workdir}'%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%# ac_add_options --with-system-png%ac_add_options --with-system-png%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --with-system-libevent%# ac_add_options --with-system-libevent%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR%# mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-system-cairo%# ac_add_options --enable-system-cairo%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --with-system-libvpx%# ac_add_options --with-system-libvpx%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-calendar%# ac_add_options --enable-calendar%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-application=mail%ac_add_options --enable-application=im%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-gstreamer%# ac_add_options --enable-alsa%g' .mozconfig # echo 'ac_add_options --disable-pulseaudio' >> .mozconfig echo 'ac_add_options --disable-gconf' >> .mozconfig
if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j${jobcount} CC='distcc gcc' CXX='distcc g++'\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure make -f client.mk build else sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4 CC=gcc CXX=g++\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk clean make -f client.mk configure make -f client.mk build fi echo '===> Trying to find libxul.so...' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist -type f -name libxul.so ccount=0 # ./obj-i686-pc-linux-gnu/dist/lib/libxul.so # ./obj-i686-pc-linux-gnu/toolkit/library/libxul.so while [ '!' -f obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/toolkit/library/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] && \ [ '!' -f obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/toolkit/library/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] ; do echo '===> Linking libxul.so failed, trying again in 5 minutes...' sleep 300 make -f client.mk build ccount=` expr $ccount + 1 ` done [ -f obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/toolkit/library/libxul.so ] || \ [ -f obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/toolkit/library/libxul.so ] || exit 1
# Now try to build the language packs # for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT ; do # make -C obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/im/locales langpack-${packlang} # make -C obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/im/locales langpack-${packlang} # done
# Now try to build the xpi of thunderbird # mv mail/installer/removed-files.in{,.orig} # cat mail/installer/removed-files.in.orig | sed 's%hyphenation/hyph%# hyphenation/hyph%g' > mail/installer/removed-files.in make -C obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu package make -C obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu package
echo '==> Searching Tarballs' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu -name '*.tar.bz2' | sort echo '==> Searching XPIs' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu -name '*.xpi' | sort
package.install:
#mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux/ #touch ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-dummy #exit 0
TARFILE=comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist/instantbird-1.6a1pre.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.tar.bz2 case $(uname -m) in x86_64) TARFILE=comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/dist/instantbird-1.6a1pre.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.tar.bz2 ;; esac [ -f "$TARFILE" ] || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications tar -C ${TGTDIR}/opt -xvjf "${TARFILE}" mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}
install -m 0644 comm-esr/im/branding/nightly/mozicon128.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/instantbird128.png mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/plugins touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/plugins/.intentionally_empty
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/instantbird-${PKGVERSION} cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/instantbird-${PKGVERSION} << FFRUN #!/bin/sh
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:\$PATH export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT"
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird \$langopts \$@
if [ "\$#" -lt 1 ] ; then exec sudo /opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird_smack else if ps waux | grep 'surfer /opt/.*/instantbird-bin' | grep -v grep ; then /opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird \$@ else sudo /opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird_smack & sleep 5 exec /opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird \$@ fi fi FFRUN
rm ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/instantbird ln -sf /usr/bin/instantbird-${PKGVERSION} ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/instantbird chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird_smack << FFSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
langopts="" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^de' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale de-DE -UILocale de-DE" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pl-PL -UILocale pl-PL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^es' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale es-ES -UILocale es-ES" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^ru' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale ru-RU -UILocale ru-RU" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^fr' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale fr-FR -UILocale fr-FR" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^it' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale it-IT -UILocale it-IT" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^nl' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale nl-NL -UILocale nl-NL" echo "\$LANGUAGE" | grep '^pt' >/dev/null && langopts="-contentLocale pt-PT -UILocale pt-PT" /static/sbin/newsmack internet /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird \$langopts"
FFSMACK
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird_smack /sbin/paxctl -m -r ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}/instantbird-bin
chown -R 0:0 ${TGTDIR}/opt/instantbird-${PKGVERSION}
cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/instantbird.desktop << IDESK
[Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=Instantbird Comment=Instant Messanger Categories=Network; Exec=/usr/bin/instantbird Icon=/usr/share/icons/instantbird128.png Terminal=false StartupNotify=true
IDESK
